5.0 out of 5 stars
Best AC So far.
ByAkhil Polaon 27 January 2016
Hardware Platform: Playstation 4
This has to be the best AC game for the next generation console so far ( Syndicate is pretty good as well)
We all knew Unity was a disaster at launch.
Having played Unity as well, I can say if you had to choose between Unity and Black Flag , ALWAYS go for Black Flag.
The open world map is pretty huge. It takes a lot of time to travel all around the West Indies.
I always loved the pirate themes i.e. POTC movies , One Piece anime. This game lets you like the life of a pirate.
This game has content for more than 100 hours easily.
The side missions are an absolute blast. The main story is pretty good as well.
But nothing comes to close to those naval battles. Fighting ships with your Jackdaw is pretty amazing.
The fighting is better than Unity hands down.
The graphics are pretty amazing.
The game is pretty cheap IMO. You can find better deals if you buy the digital version. The PlayStation Store usually has some deals.
Kudos to Ubisoft for creating such a brilliant game which is still popular more than 2 years after its release.

5.0 out of 5 stars
Pirates of the Caribbean
ByCJ BrosTOP 100 REVIEWERon 20 October 2016
Hardware Platform: Playstation 4
It is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean and have established a lawless pirate republic. You are a young captain named Edward Kenway. His exploits earn the respect of pirate legends like Blackbeard, but draw him into an ancient war that may destroy everything the pirates have built.
This pirate themed Assassin's Creed is too good. There is massive caribbean to sail. There are gorgeous and unique islands to explore. There are tombs to raid and much more to do. Black Flag is all about embracing freedom and carving your own path through the world. Naval battles are awesome. You will love sailing the ships for sure. The main story is very catchy. Side missions are also good. This game was launched in 2013 but the graphics are really next gen. I also have Assassin's Creed: Syndicate (PS4). But i will definitely say that Black Flag is better than Syndicate. There is Version 1.04 (2.314 GB) patch that fixes some bugs. According to HLTB, the main story is around 22.5 hours.
Thanks for reading. Happy gaming.

Assassin Game + Pirate Theme + Naval Combat + Stunning Visuals = Black Flag !
This game is simply epic. The visuals are stunning and very much improved over it's predecessor (AC III).
Naval Combat - The best part of this game is naval combat .You can upgrade your own ship & can ride with it wherever you want , you can attack other ships for loot and can take their crew.
Story - Story is above average , Not the best but certainly not the worst.You will have no problem with it.
Gameplay - The Gameplay is awesome , Naval combat is Excellent , Open world which is designed beautifully by Ubisoft. There are plenty of things to do other than story missions. Combat is great & Variety Of Missions.
I loved the Soundtrack also .
The presentations is awesome & you will love pretty much everything about this game , fully enjoyable.
